title: Add management team info, WhatsApp contact, and course images

requirements.text: Display management team names 'Aruna Mahajan' and 'Mahesh Gujrati' in the footer section of the application

quotes: isme management ka name Aruna mahajan, Mahesh Gujrati rakhna hai

acceptanceCriteria: Management team names appear in the footer
Names are displayed as 'Aruna Mahajan' and 'Mahesh Gujrati'
Footer section is visible on all pages

requirements.text: Add WhatsApp contact number 7330202733 in a 'Contact Us' section in the footer

quotes: contact us mein whatsapp number 7330202733 rakhna hai

acceptanceCriteria: Contact Us section displays WhatsApp number 7330202733
Number is formatted for easy readability
Contact information is accessible on all pages via footer

requirements.text: Add unique images for each of the three courses (Basic Intuition, Advanced Intuition, Super Advanced Intuition) and display them in the course cards

quotes: sabhi course mein alag alag image dal dena

acceptanceCriteria: Each course has a distinct, visually appealing image
Images are displayed in course cards on CourseList and EnrolledCourses components
Images match the theme and level of each course (Basic, Advanced, Super Advanced)
Images are properly sized and responsive

constraints: Use existing course structure with three levels: Basic, Advanced, and Super Advanced Intuition
Maintain the current warm educational color palette (orange/amber theme)
Footer must be visible across all role-based dashboards (Student, Management, Marketer)
nonGoals: Creating new courses beyond the existing three
Adding interactive WhatsApp integration or chat functionality
Modifying the backend course data structure

required: Educational brain activation illustration with basic geometric patterns for Basic Intuition course (basic-intuition.dim_400x300.png)
Advanced brain illustration with neural networks and energy patterns for Advanced Intuition course (advanced-intuition.dim_400x300.png)
Sophisticated brain visualization with cosmic elements and advanced neural pathways for Super Advanced Intuition course (super-advanced-intuition.dim_400x300.png)
